thread.title: Department of Labour hosts 5th Annual Explosives Manager Safety workshop to discuss OHS in explosives ...
thread.title_full: Department of Labour hosts 5th Annual Explosives Manager Safety workshop to discuss OHS in explosives ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Department of Labour hosts 5th Annual Explosives Manager Safety workshop to discuss OHS in explosives ...
text: ( Source : Department of Labour - Republic of South Africa ) Occupational Health and Safety ( OHS ) in explosives working environments will be high on the agenda when the Department of Labour hosts the 5th Annual Explosives Manager Safety Forum .
